attributes.additional_details: Mental health is a very serious condition and there is hardly any help available. You should actually be ashamed of yourselves leaving vulnerable people too deal with this without the help of hospital
attributes.background:
Better treatment for Mental Health Patients 
It’s is absolutely disgusting the treatment or should I say non treatment of mental health patients.
There was someone I know and love in desperate need of going into hospital and He got refused help after days of mixed delusions he was refused help
